757.quoteText: You can request access to your personal information, or correct or update out-of-date or inaccurate personal information we hold about you.
757.title: Users can request access and deletion of personal info.

tosdr.tldr: With respect to your personal information, you can request access and that we correct or delete this personal information by emailing your request to pri...@netflix.com.

872.title: No liability is accepted for improper access to your personal information.

931.quoteText:
Netflix may, from time to time, change these Terms of Use.
Such revisions shall be effective immediately.
provided however, for existing members, such revisions shall, unless otherwise stated, be effective 30 days after posting.
931.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

tosdr.case: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
tosdr.tldr: They can change the terms of service any time they see fit, even without notification to the user. Your use of the service supposedly constitutes acceptance of the changes in the terms.

1024.quoteText: We also use cookies, as well as advertising identifiers, to learn more about our users and their likely interests, and to deliver and tailor marketing or advertising.
1024.title: Personal info is used for advertising.

tosdr.case: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising
tosdr.tldr:
We keep track of your interactions with us and collect information related to you and your use of our service, including but not limited to your online activity, title selections, reviews and ratings, payment history and correspondence as well as Internet protocol addresses, device types, unique device data, such as device identifiers, operating systems, any instant watching of movies, TV shows and related activity. We use this information for such purposes as (list of stuff necessary for running the service).
...
From time to time, we may partner with companies whose products we believe will interest our members. In conjunction with these partners, we may send promotional announcements and/or serve web-based advertisements on their behalf, as permitted by law. You can go to the "Manage mailing preferences" link on the "Your Account" page and request that your name be excluded from marketing emails or postal mail.

1051.quoteText: We disclose your information for certain purposes and to third parties, as described below
1051.title: Netflix reserve the right to disclose personal info, no notification.

tosdr.case: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you
tosdr.tldr: Netflix also reserves the right to disclose personal information if we reasonably believe that access, use, preservation or disclosure of such information is reasonably necessary to (a) satisfy any applicable law, regulation, legal process, or enforceable governmental request, (b) enforce applicable terms of use, including investigation of potential violations thereof, (c) detect, prevent, or otherwise address illegal or suspected illegal activities, security or technical issues, or (d) protect against harm to the rights, property or safety of Netflix, its users or the public as required or permitted by law. In connection with any reorganization, restructuring, merger or sale, or other transferring of assets we reserve the right to transfer information, including personal information, provided that the receiving party agrees to respect your personal information in a manner that is consistent with our privacy policy.

1348.quoteText: In connection with any reorganization, restructuring, merger or sale, or other transfer of assets, we will transfer information, including personal information, provided that the receiving party agrees to respect your personal information in a manner that is consistent with our Privacy Statement.
1348.title: Promises will be kept after a merger or acquisition

tosdr.case: Promises will be kept after a merger or acquisition
tosdr.tldr: Your information can be transferred to a new company, but only if it complies with Netflix's Privacy Policy.

8378.quoteText: We will charge your Payment Method for your monthly membership fee at the end of the free trial period and your membership will automatically renew monthly unless you cancel your membership prior to the end of the free trial period.
8378.title: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis

tosdr.case: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis

10680.quoteText: No Refunds. Payments are nonrefundable and there are no refunds or credits for partially used periods. Following any cancellation, however, you will continue to have access to the service through the end of your current billing period. At any time, and for any reason, we may provide a refund, discount, or other consideration to some or all of our members ("credits"). The amount and form of such credits, and the decision to provide them, are at our sole and absolute discretion. The provision of credits in one instance does not entitle you to credits in the future for similar instances, nor does it obligate us to provide credits in the future, under any circumstance.
10680.title: The service has a no refund policy

tosdr.case: The service has a no refund policy

10681.quoteText: You must be 18 years of age, or the age of majority in your province, territory or country, to become a member of the Netflix service. Individuals under the age of 18, or applicable age of majority, may utilize the service only with the involvement of a parent or legal guardian, under such person's account and otherwise subject to these Terms of Use.
10681.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age

10682.quoteText: use any robot, spider, scraper or other automated means to access the Netflix service.
10682.title: Spidering or crawling is not allowed

tosdr.case: Spidering or crawling is not allowed

10683.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms

11354.quoteText: The Netflix service may be provided through and/or utilize features (such as voice controls) operated by third party platforms, or contain links to sites operated by third parties whose policies regarding the handling of information may differ from ours.
11354.title: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

tosdr.case: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

11355.quoteText: We and our Service Providers use cookies and other technologies (such as web beacons)
11355.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

11356.quoteText:
These Terms of Use shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the state of Delaware, U.S.A.
without regard to conflict of laws provisions.
11356.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.

tosdr.case: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.

11595.quoteText: THE NETFLIX SERVICE AND ALL CONTENT AND SOFTWARE ASSOCIATED THEREWITH, OR ANY OTHER FEATURES OR FUNCTIONALITIES ASSOCIATED WITH THE NETFLIX SERVICE, ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" WITH ALL FAULTS AND WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND.
11595.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

tosdr.case: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

11596.quoteText: NETFLIX DOES NOT GUARANTEE, REPRESENT, OR WARRANT THAT YOUR USE OF THE NETFLIX SERVICE WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED OR ERROR-FREE.
11596.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

tosdr.case: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

11597.quoteText:
You agree that, by agreeing to these Terms of Use, the U.S.
Federal Arbitration Act governs the interpretation and enforcement of this provision, and that you and Netflix are each waiving the right to a trial by jury or to participate in a class action.
